short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for covid stats for India

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Covid19 India provides real-time data about the corona virus (COVID-19) in India.

It provides detailed information of every state and union territory in form of both numerical and graphical data.

The extension badge displays the total no of confirmed Covid19 cases in India.

Users can change Icon Badge, Graph and Table Settings in the Settings Tab.

This extension also comes with 2 themes Light and Dark (Displayed by the Icon on Bottom Right Corner in extension window ).
